group_1.textRight: Who, me～?

group_1.textLeft: Ranka seems to know something about it, too.

group_1.textRight: Oh, so you noticed...

group_1.textLeft: Ao, are you in some kind of trouble...?

group_1.textRight: You're always trying to go home early lately.

group_1.textLeft: You seem to have a lot on your mind.

group_1.textRight: Well... It's not really a "problem", but...
We've been out and about a lot@with the battle against Kamihama, right?
Leaving the house early in the morning,@getting home late at night...
Before I became a Magical Girl, I rarely did that.
My parents keep chewing me out over it...
I've been trying to come up with excuses,@but of course, that just ticks them off.
And they gave me a warning...
That's why I've been going home early@unless I have something to do～
Wouldn't you be in trouble if I got grounded?

group_1.textLeft: Your absence would certainly hurt us...

group_1.textRight: But it's kinda hard for us to get involved
when it's a problem at home.
Mm, you can't really expect your parents
to understand that you're a Magical Girl.
...Oh, but there's one thing I could ask you all to do!
My parents asked me why I'm out all the time.
Sooo～@I told them I'm in an eSports tournament.
Even though they usually don't like me playing@games, they were interested...
It made me happy, too,@and we got to talking about it.
Since that's the story I'm going with, I need to enter@a competition riiight aboouut...now.
Teehee～
Anyway, I'm entering with Ranka.
But I think the more people we have,@the more persuasive it'll be.
I was hoping to take a picture of all of us@playing games together.

group_1.textLeft: Will we need to go somewhere for the@tournament...?

group_1.textRight: Nope, it's all online.
I told my parents that I was getting together@with people at a friend's house for it～
It would be nice if I could take a picture of us@in your room or something, Sister～
Also, the game I'm playing needs a five-person party.
I've been keeping up with some girls my age@that I met in a chat room about making a team.
Now I'm waiting to hear back from them.
Yeah, that's why we haven't had much extra time@lately.

group_1.textLeft: Is it that easy to enter a game competition?

group_1.textRight: Oh!@I'm glad you asked, Hikaru～
